about_the_game:
Sit down my friend, and i shall tell you the fable of this game.

A fable about courage, light and darkness!
A fable about wasps and fireflies...

And nonetheless...
A fable about a little blue fox called Rine and how he bravely bought back the light to the world!

How did the light went missing?
He he… We shall let the story tell!
Rine woke up after a deep slumber only to find out that all the light in the world went missing!
But worry not! The trustworthy fireflies, the only source of light that remained, are a resourceful bunch!
They sent our lovely fox to meet the firefly king! He is the keeper of the primordial light! And he should surely know what happened… right? He he….

But this journey, which Rine will take, is not one without dangers. The darkness fell on to the world, leaving all the animals in a crazy state. They will attack everyone that gets near them!
And we shall not forget the wasps who stings everyone's… ahem… a world full of dangers indeed!

Now go my friend! Play this game and unveil the mystery of the missing light!

GAME MECHANICS

Each firefly has a color. Gather up to three fireflies and combine their colors in order to activate the flowers and open a path for you!

KEY FEATURES

  • A massively open world — Discover a big open world full of stories, puzzles and hidden quests that will keep you immersed into the game. Play as you like and go where you please!

  • Funny and intriguing interactions — The fireflies are resourceful, helpful and funny. Each one of them has their own story! Discover each one of them and do their quests… and you shall be rewarded with a great achievement!

  • Diversity — A variety of enemies to run from, and plants to interact with! Use the fireflies collected along the way to interact with the plants and to open a path for you!

  • Boss battles — Some animals grew wild and strong because of the darkness. Help them recover from the frenzy!

name: Rine: The Trail of Fireflies

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-4670 (quad-core) / AMD® FX-Series™ FX-4350 (quad-core)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 1050 (2 GB) / AMD® Radeon™ RX-460 (4 GB) / Intel® Arc™ A380 (6 GB)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-7600 (quad-core) / AMD® Ryzen™ 3 2200G (quad-core)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 1060 (6 GB) / AMD® Radeon™ RX 580 (8 GB) / Intel® Arc™ A580 (8 GB)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 20 MB available space

short_description: Embark yourself in a journey about light, fireflies and a cute little blue fox. Help Rine befriend the fireflies along the way. They will guide him to solve the mystery of the missing light.
